At our request, Google will use this information for the purpose of measuring your activity on our Website, compiling statistical reports on overall website activity for us and providing other services relating to Website activity and internet usage.
Google will not associate your IP address with any other data held by Google.

In addition, you can prevent the collection of the data generated by the cookie by Google, as well as the processing of this data by Google, by downloading and installing the browser plug-in available from the following link: http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout?hl=de.
On the Website we use Google Analytics, a web analytics service provided by Google, Inc. ("Google"), which uses cookies to analyse how users use the Site.
The information generated by the cookie about your use of the Site will generally be transmitted to and stored by Google on servers in the United States.
You may refuse the use of cookies by selecting the appropriate settings on your browser, however, please note that if you do this you may not be able to use the full functionality of our Website.
